		<script>
		jQuery(document).ready( function($) {
			$('#search-field').val("");
  			// Set up variables for each of the pertinent elements
  			var $searchWrap = $('.search-form'),
      		$searchField = $('.search-form .search-field'),
      		$loadingIcon = $('.search-form .loading'),
      		termExists = "";

  			// Debounce function from https://davidwalsh.name/javascript-debounce-function
  			function debounce(func, wait, immediate) {
    			var timeout;
    			return function() {
      				var context = this, args = arguments;
      				var later = function() {
        				timeout = null;
        				if (!immediate) func.apply(context, args);
      				};
      				var callNow = immediate && !timeout;
      				clearTimeout(timeout);
      				timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      				if (callNow) func.apply(context, args);
    			};
  			};

  			// Add results container and disable autocomplete on search field
  			$searchWrap.append('<div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 results"></div>');
  			var $searchResults = $('.search-form .results');
  			$searchField.attr('autocomplete', 'on');

  			// Perform search on keyup in search field, hide/show loading icon
  			//$searchField.keyup( function() {
  			$(".absenden").click(function(){
    			$loadingIcon.css('display', 'block');

    			// If the search field is not empty, perform the search function
    			if( $searchField.val() !== "" ) {
      				termExists = true;
      				doSearch();
    			} 
    			else {
      				termExists = false;
      				$searchResults.empty();
      				$loadingIcon.css('display', 'none');
    			}
  			});

  			https://contemporaryand.com
  			var doSearch = debounce(function() {
    			var query = $searchField.val();
    			$.ajax({
      				type: 'GET',
      				url: 'https://contemporaryand.com/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php', 
      				crossDomain: true,
            		beforeSend: function(xhr) {
                		xhr.withCredentials = true;
          			}, 
      				data: {
        			action: 'ajax_search',
        			query: query,
      			},
      			success: function(result) {
        			if ( termExists ) {
          				$searchResults.html('<div class="results-list" style="">' + result + '</div>');
        			}
      			},
      			error: function (request, status, error) {
        alert(request.responseText);},

      			complete: function() {
        			$loadingIcon.css('display', 'none');
      			}
    		});
  	}, 8000);

});
		</script>

$(".bootstrapslider2").on("touchstart", function(event){
        var xClick = event.originalEvent.touches[0].pageX;
    $(this).one("touchmove", function(event){
        var xMove = event.originalEvent.touches[0].pageX;
        if( Math.floor(xClick - xMove) > 5 ){
            $(".carousel").carousel('prev');
        }
        else if( Math.floor(xClick - xMove) < -5 ){
            $(".carousel").carousel('next');
        }
    });
    $(".carousel").on("touchend", function(){
            $(this).off("touchmove");
    });
});

<style>
	.cand-survey-popup { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5); width: 100%; height: 100%; position: fixed; z-index: 99999999999; top: 0; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; }
	.cand-survey-popup .cand-survey-inner { position: relative; width: calc(100% - 60px); max-width: 600px; height:580px;  background: #0000ff; color: white; padding: 36px; }	
	.cand-survey-popup .cand-survey-close { }
	.cand-survey-popup .cand-survey-close, .cand-survey-popup h2, .cand-survey-popup p, .cand-survey-popup a { color:#FFF!important; }
	.cand-survey-popup  #cand-survey-submit, .cand-survey-popup .cand-survey-close { cursor:pointer; }

	.cand-survey-popup .cand-survey-head { display: flex; justify-content: space-between;  flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: nowrap; align-items: flex-start; height: 20%; }

<script>
    function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
        var d = new Date();
        d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
        var expires = "expires="+d.toUTCString();
        document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
    }
    function getCookie(cname) {
        var name = cname + "=";
        var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	        for(var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
	            var c = ca[i];
	        while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
	            c = c.substring(1);
	        }
            if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
	            return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
            }
        }
        return "";
    }
    function checkCookie() {
        var user = getCookie("CANDDONATIONSTATUS");
        if (user == "") {
            var currentUrl = document.location.href;
            var popUpContent = 
				'<div class="cand-survey-popup">'+
					'<div class="cand-survey-inner">'+
						'<div class="cand-survey-head">'+
							'<img src="https://contemporaryand.com/wp-content/themes/cand2024_RD_1.3.24/images/join-patreon-heading.png" style="width: 464px; height: auto; align-self: flex-end; padding-bottom: 25px;">'+
							'<div id="cand-survey-close" class=" cand-survey-close icon icon_close"></div>'+
						'</div>'+
						'<div class="cand-survey-columns">'+	
							'<div class="cand-survey-columns-left">'+	
									'<p>For 10 years, C& has been co-creating a bright cosmos of brilliant stars. Become a member today, receive a special gift and secure your place in the Cosmos!</p>'+
									'<div class="survey-butts">'+
										'<div id="cand-survey-submit" class="button">BECOME A MEMBER</div>'+
										'<div id="cand-member-more" class="button cand-survey-close">TELL ME MORE</div>'+
									'</div>'+
							'</div>'+
							'<div class="cand-survey-columns-right">'+		
								'<img src="https://contemporaryand.com/wp-content/themes/cand2024_RD_1.3.24/images/cand-donation-pop-up.jpg" style="width: 90%; height: auto;">'+
								'<img class="cand-survey-logo" src="https://contemporaryand.com/wp-content/themes/cand2024_RD_1.3.24/images/survey-popup-cand-logo.png" style="width: 75px; height: auto;">'+
							'</div>	'+
						'</div>	'+	
					'</div>'+
				'</div>';
            var relEl = document.querySelector('body');
            document.querySelector('body').style.overflow = 'hidden';
            relEl.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend',popUpContent);
            
            document.querySelector('#cand-survey-submit').addEventListener('click', function() {
                window.location = 'https://www.patreon.com/contemporaryand/';
                jQuery('.cand-survey-popup').remove();
                setCookie("CANDDONATIONSTATUS", 'VIEWED', 1);
                document.querySelector('body').style.overflow = 'auto';
            });

			document.querySelector('#cand-member-more').addEventListener('click', function() {
                window.location = 'https://contemporaryand.com/magazines/c-launches-patreon-membership/';
                jQuery('.cand-survey-popup').remove();
                setCookie("CANDDONATIONSTATUS", 'VIEWED', 1);
                document.querySelector('body').style.overflow = 'auto';
            });
            
            document.querySelector('#cand-survey-close').addEventListener('click', function() {
                //console.log('Test')
                jQuery('.cand-survey-popup').remove();
                setCookie("CANDDONATIONSTATUS", 'VIEWED', 1);
                document.querySelector('body').style.overflow = 'auto';
            });

        }
    }
	
	$(document).ready(function() {
	var nlmodal = 0;
	// Borlabs accept Button
	  $('._brlbs-btn').click(function() {
	  if (nlmodal == 0) {
		setTimeout(function(){ 
		checkCookie(); }, 120000);
		nlmodal = 1;
				};
	  });
	});
	
	$( document ).ready( function( $ ) {
		modalcheck = 0;

				setTimeout(function () {
					checkCookie();

	});
	
	
    
</script>
